message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a range of features that make it stand out in its category. I believe its value far exceeds $80 and could significantly benefit you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $120. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
